title: Mixing Two Real Values
description: This function takes two real values and a mixing factor and returns a mixed value based on the specified factor. The mixing is done by taking a weighted sum of the two input values, where the weight is determined by the mixing factor M.
name: MIX

input.name: A
input.description: The first real value to be mixed.

input.name: B
input.description: The second real value to be mixed.

input.name: M
input.description: The mixing factor, which determines the weight of each input value in the final result.

return_value.description: The result of the mixing operation, calculated as (1.0 - M) * A + M * B.
